mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_room (product_id, buyer_id, seller_id, created_at) VALUES (#{product.id}, #{buyer.id}, #{seller.id}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT cr.id, cr.created_at, p.id as product_id, p.title as product_title, buyer.id as buyer_id, buyer.email as buyer_email, buyer.nickname as buyer_nickname, seller.id as seller_id, seller.email as seller_email, seller.nickname as seller_nickname FROM chat_room cr JOIN product p ON cr.product_id = p.id JOIN user buyer ON cr.buyer_id = buyer.id JOIN user seller ON cr.seller_id = seller.id WHERE cr.product_id = #{productId} AND cr.buyer_id = #{buyerId}

SELECT cr.id, cr.created_at, p.id as product_id, p.title as product_title, buyer.id as buyer_id, buyer.email as buyer_email, buyer.nickname as buyer_nickname, seller.id as seller_id, seller.email as seller_email, seller.nickname as seller_nickname FROM chat_room cr JOIN product p ON cr.product_id = p.id JOIN user buyer ON cr.buyer_id = buyer.id JOIN user seller ON cr.seller_id = seller.id WHERE cr.id = #{id}
